name: i3-status-starter
description: Template for writing own modules for i3-status

scripts.test: npm run compile && node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-register test --recursive --reporter gitlablist-mocha
scripts.watch: (babel -w src/ -d lib -s &) && sleep 5 && node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-register test --recursive  --reporter min --watch

author: Christian Fehmer
